alert.note: Alert for Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 5:22PM EDT until July 07 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR SCHOHARIE COUNTY... At 521 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Richmondville, or near Cobleskill, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cobleskill, Jefferson, Middleburgh, Summit, Schoharie, Richmondville, Livingstonville, Breakabeen, Central Bridge, Seward, Zeh Corners, West Richmondville, Baird Corners, Huntersland, Warnerville, Gardnersville, Becker Corners, West Fulton, Shutts Corners and Arabia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
